    • 构造器详细资料

      • DeviceVpnManager

        public DeviceVpnManager()

    • 方法详细资料

      • setVpnDisabled

        public boolean setVpnDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                              boolean allow)
        Called by an application that is administering the device to allow ues the vpn or forbid use the vpn on the device, for this user. After calling this, the device will be allowed or forbidden to use the vpn.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with. It can't be null.
        allow - True is forbid VPN and false is allow.
        返回:
        true if set policy data successfully.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_VPN} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • isVpnDisabled

        public boolean isVpnDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin)
        Called by an application that is to know if the device is allowed or forbidden to ues the vpn, for this user. After calling this, the result of the device is allowed or forbidden to use the vpn will be returned.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with. It can be null.
        返回:
        false if allow device use the VPN and true is forbid device use the VPN.

      • setVpnProfile

        public boolean setVpnProfile(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                             DeviceVpnProfile profile)
        Called by an application that is administering the device to set the vpn or modify the vpn on the device, for this user. After calling this, the vpn config will be added or modified.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with. It can't be null.
        profile - The VPN config file.
        返回:
        void.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_VPN} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • deleteVpnProfile

        public boolean deleteVpnProfile(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                java.lang.String key)
        Called by an application that is administering the device to delete the vpn on the device, for this user. After calling this, the vpn config will be deleted according to the key.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with. It can't be null.
        key - The key of the VPN config file that will be deleted.
        返回:
        void.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_VPN} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • getVpnList

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getVpnList(android.content.ComponentName admin)
        Called by an application that is administering the device to get the list of all vpn's key on the device, for this user. After calling this, the list of all vpn's key will be returned.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with. It can be null.
        返回:
        Empty string list if there is no vpn set on device, otherwise a list of all vpn's key.

      • getVpnProfile

        public DeviceVpnProfile getVpnProfile(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                      java.lang.String key)
        Called by an application that is administering the device to get the vpn config file according to the key on the device, for this user. After calling this, the vpn config file according to the key will be returned.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with. It can be null.
        key - The key of the VPN config file that will be returned.
        返回:
        the vpn config file according to the key or null if the vpn don't exists

      • setInsecureVpnDisabled

        public boolean setInsecureVpnDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin,
                                      boolean disabled)
        Called by an application that is administering the device to allow ues the secure vpn only or use the all vpn on the device, for this user. After calling this, the device will be allowed to use the sercure vpn only or not.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with. It can't be null.
        disabled - True is allow the secure vpn only.
        返回:
        true if set policy data successfully.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_VPN} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.

      • isInsecureVpnDisabled

        public boolean isInsecureVpnDisabled(android.content.ComponentName admin)
        Called by an application that is to know if the device is allowed to ues the secure vpn only, for this user. After calling this, the result of the device is allowed to ues the secure vpn only will be returned.
        参数:
        admin - Which { DeviceAdminReceiver} this request is associated with. It can be null.
        返回:
        false if allow device use the all VPN and true is allow device use the secure vpn only.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input parameters are not suitable, an IllegalArgumentException will be throwed.
        java.lang.SecurityException - if the calling device admin does not have { com.huawei.permission.sec.MDM_VPN} permission in HUAWEI MDM certificate, or is not actived, a SecurityException will be throwed.
